Book Abbreviations

The following abbreviations and alternate titles are currently supported when searching a given text for scripture references.

The search for references is case-insensitive; and, generally, a period trailing the abbreviation is optional (e.g. "Gen", "Gen.", "gen", and "gen." should all evaluate to "Genesis").

This list is subject to change (especially in pre 1.0.0 releases). If you see anything that needs to be changed, removed, and/or added, please submit an issue in GitHub (or submit a pull request - contributions are welcome).

BookAbbreviations and Alternate Titles
GenesisGen
ExodusExod, Exo
LeviticusLev
NumbersNum
DeuteronomyDeut, Deu
JoshuaJosh, Jos, Jsh
JudgesJudg, Jdgs, Jdg
RuthRut, Rth

2 Kings2Kings, II Kings, 2nd Kings, Second Kings, 2 Kgs, 2Kgs, II Kgs, 2nd Kgs, Second Kgs, 2 Kin, 2Kin, II Kin, 2nd Kin, Second Kin, 2 Ki, 2KI, I Ki, 2nd Ki, Second Ki
